item.description:
Hi Everyone,

WIND 9 @ 160..ACCEPTABLE for this location...

Saturday May 22, start paddling by 12 noon.

Bring sun protection , water, and some paddling gloves..etc.

Oh yes......almost forgot....Bring a snack for the Half Point of our trip while stopping at a ghost town to look for skellatons.


Weather: http://www.usairnet.c...

? too soon to list but looking good so far..

Of course bad weather cancells this event, there will be a backup event for Sunday if necessary.

I chose a time of 11:30 to start arriving, (You have to go through Middletown and traffic is bad at 12:00-1) and this is a popular boaters spot so ...
and lets hit the water at 12 noon so we can explore the good spots,
I anticipate 3 pm to be low tide in the farthest points of this trip..

Im anticipating heading off to Hurd around 4 pm ?



Tides for Haddam starting with May 22, 2010.

Day High Tide Height Sunrise Moon Time % Moon
/Low Time Feet Sunset Visible

Sa 22 Low 2:21 AM 0.3 5:25 AM Set 2:00 AM 60
22 High 7:50 AM 2.6 8:09 PM Rise 2:34 PM
22 Low 2:40 PM 0.1
22 High 8:26 PM 3.


Here is something close for most all of us.
There will be a few course changes and interesting areas we will pass through so it wont be the exact same back track.

As with all my trips, i don't give specifics, its for your discovery as i discovered them for my first time,
and i dont offer the paddling time or milage.. when we are done ..we are done--- when we are done paddling then its the barbie-q.. anticipate the entire day and a good part of the evening by a nice fire.
---------------------------------

Getting There:

The best way to get to this PUT IN location by SALMON COVE is by using the same directions to GOODSPEED OPRAH HOUSE,

For GPS use 117 East Haddam Moodus Road, East Haddam,
The Meetup* location Map link above is correct for a visual map.

Getting There, From Hartford:

take I-91 south: take Exit 22s. (left hand exit) = Route 9 South , take Exit 7, (rte 82 to the Goodspeed Oprah House.

At the end of the exit ramp take a left onto Middlesex tpk=rte 154 for a few hundred feet then back onto rte 82 east, cross the river and pass the oprah house and slow down.

Take a sharp left onto rte 149 at the Gelston House. Be Careful at this intersection.

The State boat ramp sign and road is 1 mile north of the left after you turned from the Opra House..

--------------------------------------------------------------

THE Pot Luck Barbie-Q AFTER PARTY is at HURD Park

I WILL LOAD THE GRILL , SOME FOOD. and some fire place wood,
if you have some scrap wood, bring it.


-----------------------------------------------------------------

Directions to Hurd State Park as we leave the boat ramp area:


From Boat ramp Road,

Take a left onto rte 149 north

Go to rte 609= Leesville Rd

then left (really keep straight) onto rte 151


Keep going to the intersection of 151/Hog Hill Road/Hurd Park Road,
Take a sharp left onto "Hurd Park Road", go apx 0.75 miles then the main park entrance is on the right,
Follow the paved road in for apx 0.75 miles then there is a sign that says "BALL" field and SHELTER,
take that right and go to end,
we will be at the shelter at one of the Big fireplaces.

..BRING SOME WOOD..YOUR CHAIRS, ....bugg juice and food..LOL



---------------------------------------

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Kayaks available:

Paddle & Leash, Life Jacket with whistle is included with any of my yaks.

Dougnation of 20 bucks for my kayaks reserved for this particular event.
Its way less than what sport shops charge and the yaks & Paddles are top quality dillivered and picked up at the site etc..

Please make sure you are familiar with the yak you choose and can fit in them since i don't have any wide yaks anymore.


I will only bring the yaks that are confirmed by a yes and by persons i have some familiarity with..

Maybee's obviously can't reserve any yaks and if ya reserve one and don't show up ya won't ever get a second chance to again.

Sorry i don't like to leave un-attended yaks on the trailer. They get stolen too easily.


IF USING MY YAKS YOU CANT LOOK LIKE A BONEHEADED BEGINNER AND STEP INTO THEM VIA THE FLOOR OR DRIVE UP ON SHORE WITH THEM LIKE YOU ARE GOING TO A DRIVE IN MOVIE. READ THE INFO ON THE FOLLOWING LINK: I will also show you the correct way and you will look like a intelligent seasoned pro and impress the others who don't know how. Or you may laugh at the ones that fall in who don't know how.
http://www.ehow.com/h...

Please review the links below for the equipment specifications to be at least familiar with which boat or equipment you would be best suited for.

Cheap LIfe Jackets with a whistle is all i have for you since a GOOD QUALITY LIFE JACKET should be chosen for your particular body shapes and paddling style, if you have your own please bring it..
------------------
All my yaks come with Werner Carbon Kalliste Paddles (my recommended brand and type). Different lengths and types of the same version are in the bucket.

http://www.wernerpadd...

(No ya cant use these paddles for paddle float entry practice. i have some cheap ones for that.)-
---------------------

Also for comfort is my favourtie Yak Pad optional accessory to all yaks on trips that we are actually going somewhere..

http://www.yakpads.co...

-----------------------

Riot Tourlite 15, Blue, Rudder Equipped.
For small paddler (apx 150 lbs) with Intermediate Experience.

http://wickedwaters.c...

transitional kayak, 15'= THIS KAYAK IS FOR SALE $550.00.....I will have this at the event to try if reserved... = Available .
----------------------------

Cobra Expidition, Yellow, Rudder Equipped.
For an average sized paddler apx (150 to 220 lbs) with Intermediate experience.

http://www.cobrakayak...

Fast Sea kayak, Sit On Top type, moderate to low initial stability, 18', = (depends on water temp, kind of cold ?)= NOT AVAILABLE YET water is too cold.

------------------------------

Eddyline Wind Dancer, Red, Rudder Equipped.
For almost any sized paddler apx (100 to 240 lbs) with Novice and up skills.

http://www.epinions.c...

highly stable (initial & secondary) comfortable Sea kayak, 18'=
. RESERVED FOR - ROB P.

---------------------------------

NDK Greenlander Pro, Red, Skeg Equipped.
Medium sized paddler (150-200 lbs) with Intermediate to Advanced skills.

http://www.atlanticka...

fast Greenland style Sea kayak, moderated stability, 18'= Available .

------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Composite Ultra Light (Un Modified), Red and White, Skeg Version.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.belhavenca...

, stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (40 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.0"= Available .

--------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Composite Ultra Light (Modified), Yellow, Skeg Version.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.belhavenca...

stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (40 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.0"= RESERVED FOR LILLY

----------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Plastic, Fire Color, Rudder Equipped.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.neckykayak...

stable and predictable Transitional type moderate weight (50 LB) ladies kayak, 15'3.5"= . ROB P, GUEST.

------------------------------------------

Guillemot Night Heron

Greenland Paddle available also.

Medium Sized Paddler (apx 150 - 220 Lbs) with beginner/intermediate and up skills.

http://www.guillemot-...

Overall a stable and predictable Sea kayak with Greenland style hull (45 lbs), 18' =
Available .

-----------------------------------------------------------------



See you all there..
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the orange cones, trailer, and ORANGE HAT

item.name: KAYAKING --SALMON RIVER COVE & HURD PARK GROUP POT LUCK BARBIE- q and BIG FIRE.
